title: Timeline
note: A tool to showcase your work
desc: Created a local-app to showcase a history of achivements including projects, skills and events in form of nested cards with timeline updating for each card upon scroll.

title: Learnt Containerization and Orchestration
note: Using containers for quick and scalable deployment.
desc: End-to-end containerization & orchestration: built images with multi-stage Dockerfiles, used Compose for multi-service dev, then deployed a sample stack on Kubernetes (Pods, Deployments, Services) with CI building/pushing images.

title: Docker Containers
desc: Packaged apps into Docker images, optimized with multi-stage builds, managed env vars/volumes/networks, and ran local stacks via docker-compose (API + DB).

title: Kubernetes
desc: Ran the stack on Kubernetes: Deployments & Services with Ingress, ConfigMaps/Secrets, basic autoscaling (HPA), and rollout/health checks using kubectl and logs.
